column5: Maryland Farms is an upscale fully modernized barn with original farm appointments available for weekend, vacation, and holiday rentals. The gorgeous renovated 120 year old barn sits on 20 gently rolling acres in northern Collin County about an hour north of downtown Dallas, and comfortably sleeps 8+. A gentile setting with modern amenities incorporated with rustic charm. The views are stunning and expansive, close to boutique shops, wineries, horse farms, and Lake Ray Roberts.
column8: Maryland Farms, a 120 yo Barn in Celina, Texas
